reader.sql: select usercenter, gcbh, leix, gonghlx, gongsmc, diz, youb, lianxr, dianh, chuanz, beihzq, fayzq, kacbztj, songhzdpc, songhzxpc, neibgys_cangkbh, edzzl, bodfdxs, fayd, neibyhzx, biaos from ckx_gongys where 1=1
select peislx, peislxmc, baozlx, baozsl, zuicddcws, tongbjpbs, shangxd, peitsxbs, beihtqq, xiaohccxc, shifgj, beiz, shifbhd, cangkbh, biaos, zickbh from ckx_peislb where 1=1

select usercenter, fenpqh, lingjbh, gongysbh, shengcxbh, lujbh, lujmc, fahd, waibms, wjianglms, wshengxsj, gongyfe, zhidgys, jiaofm, beihzq, yunszq, gcbh, xiehztbh, songhpc, beihsjc, mudd, dinghck, mos2, jianglms2, shengxsj2, cangkshpc2, cangkshsj2, cangkfhsj2, beihsj2, ibeihsj2, pbeihsj2, xianbck, mos, jianglms, shengxsj, cangkshpc, cangkshsj, cangkfhsj, beihsj, ibeihsj, pbeihsj, zhizlx from ckx_wullj where 1=1
select usercenter, shengcxbh, xiaohcbh, riq, tangc, to_char(kaisbhsj, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') kaisbhsj, to_char(chufsxsj, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') chufsxsj from ckx_xiaohcyssk where 1=1
select usercenter, lingjbh, fenpqh, qid, qidlx, mos, shengxbs, jianglms, jianglmssxsj, shengcxbh, zick, zuh from ckx_shengcx_xianb where 1=1

select usercenter, lingjbh, zhongwmc, fawmc, lingjlx, lingjsx, jihy, danw, zhizlx, to_char(kaisrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') kaisrq, to_char(jiesrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') jiesrq, zhuangcxs, anqm, lingjzl, biaos, guanjljjb, dinghcj, gongybm, zongcldm, to_char(diycqysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') diycqysj from ckx_lingj where 1=1

select usercenter, lingjbh, cangkbh, zickbh, yuanckbh, xiehztbh, anqkcts, anqkcsl, zuidkcts, zuidkcsl, dingdbdzl, dingdzzzl, yijfzl, xittzz, danqkbh, danqkw, zuidsx, zuixxx, jistzz, to_char(shengxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shengxsj, zuixqdl, shifxlh, beiykbh, dingzkw, usbzlx, usbzrl, uclx, ucrl, fifo, zidfhbz, zuh from ckx_lingjck where 1=1

select usercenter, uth, to_char(utscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') utscsj, blh, xiehzt, tch, cangkbh, chengysdm, chengysmc, fayzsl, zhuangt, to_char(yujddsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') yujddsj, to_char(blscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') blscsj, dayzt, fayzmzdw, yuanuth, yuanblh, to_char(yanssj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') yanssj, shiftb, jiufqjzxh from ck_daohtzd where 1=1

select usercenter, ush, elh, ulh, blh, uth, cangkbh, zickbh, cangklx, kuwbh, yuanbqbh, gongysdm, gongysmc, gongyslx, chengysdm, chengysmc, fayzmzdw, pich, usxh, usrl, ucxh, ucrl, ucgs, lingjbh, lingjmc, danw, lingjsl, keyljsl, baozzt, zhuangtsx, ruklx, to_char(rukrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') rukrq, to_char(shixrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shixrq, chanx, jingz, maoz, to_char(daysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') daysj, beiz, yansts, rkpjh, yclx, rwld, yuanckh, to_char(baofrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') baofrq, xiaohsl, fanxsl, tuihsl, to_char(caozsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') caozsj, caozybh, caozymc, cangkglyz from ck_usbq where 1=1

select yaohlh, usercenter, xunhbm, kanbkh, to_char(jiaofj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') jiaofj, to_char(zuizsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') zuizsj, to_char(zuiwsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') zuiwsj, lingjbh, lingjmc, danw, yaohsl, baozxh, usxh, ucxh, ucrl, ucgs, fahd, to_char(faysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') faysj, to_char(shangxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shangxsj, xiehd, xinxhd, cangkbh, zickbh, mudd, xinmdd, muddlx, yaohlzt, dingdh, dingdmxid, shengbr, yaohlsl, yaohllx, tongblshqj, tiaohbs, beiz, gongysdm, gongysmc, chej, shnagxfs, chanx, keh, peislb, jiaofzl, daijfsl, fifo, shiflsk, to_char(yaohlscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') yaohlscsj, to_char(xiughyjjfsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') xiughyjjfsj, jiaofzt, to_char(shijfysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shijfysj, peizlssl, chengysdm,chengysmc, shifpz from ck_yaohl where 1=1
select liush, usercenter, cangkbh, lingjbh, danw, lingjsl, dingdzzlj, anqkcts, anqkc, to_char(kucsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') kucsj, kuaizlx from ck_kuckz where 1=1

select usercenter, uch, ush, elh, pich, cangkbh, zickbh, keh, shangxlx, shangxms, peislb, kuwbh, usxh, usrl, ucxh, ucrl, ucgs, uah, uaxh, uarl, lingjbh, lingjmc, danw, lingjsl, yaohlh, gongysdm, gongysmc, mudd, muddlx, tongbkslsh, tongbjslsh, beihdh, peizdh, cheph, fahtzdh, shangxfs, xiehd, to_char(shangxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shangxsj, to_char(daysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') daysj, to_char(chukrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') chukrq, baozzt, zhuangtsx, usercode, username, beihybh from ck_ucbq where 1=1
